content: here s a cute chameleon amigurumi inspired by pascal his features include a happy smiling face as he s so pleased to be your friend and a winding spiral tail as chameleons are known for he is part of my open mouth amigurumi series 1 where i take the head base as a starting point and make all types of different amigurumis with it this is a slightly smaller version size chameleon than my other previously published chameleon pattern that i ve released approximate size 8 inches in length and 3 5 inches tall ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your project turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 2 also you can crochet along with me with the chameleon video tutorial 3 and see the chameleon in action ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** easy intermediate **need to know ** chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet how to increase how to decrease how to sew parts together 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/open-mouth-amigurumi-series 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //youtu be/vd4pngt8yei
